attacks.name: Malicious Strike
attacks.special: If more Successes are rolled than Failures, the target is knocked Prone if on a 50mm base or less.

attacks.name: Choke
attacks.special: This Attack's Power is not boosted by any equipped weapons. If HP is removed by this Attack, enemy models must take a Bravery Test as if the target had been Knocked Out.

traits.name: Fell Warrior
traits.description: The Dark Lord gains +1AP for each enemy Character they Knock Out. This resets at the start of each Round.

traits.name: Dark Warlock
traits.description: The Dark Lord gains the Mage trait and may cast Spells from the Lore of Villainy

traits.name: Master of the Horde
traits.description: All Hobgoblin Characters cost -20% GP, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

traits.name: Beast Master
traits.description: All Beasts, Monsters, and Titans taken from the Bestiary cost -20% GP, rounded up to the nearest whole number.
